long_description: A bit thinner and lighter than standard 1 in. flat webbing, Tapecraft 1 in. Lightweight nylon flat webbing is a great option for lashing gear to the roof of your car or repairing backpack straps. Has an average tensile strength of 1,650 lbf. Sold by the foot. Not for climbing use.
short_description: A bit thinner and lighter than standard 1 in. flat webbing, Tapecraft 1 in. Lightweight nylon flat webbing is a great option for lashing gear to the roof of your car or repairing backpack straps.
